## WPRDC API Call

```{r blotter}
# Generate URL
url <- URLencode('https://data.wprdc.org/api/action/datastore_search_sql?sql=SELECT * FROM "1797ead8-8262-41cc-9099-cbc8a161924b"', repeated = TRUE)
# Send request
get <- GET(url)
# Retrieve results
results <- fromJSON(content(get, "text"))$result$records
# View Records
View(results)
```

## Esri Call
